body_html: @mruberry I think the primary risk is we're doing more double-precision operations than we used to. I think the additional correctness is worth it but it would be nice to know how much we are paying (if we are paying anything, that is!)
body_text: @mruberry I think the primary risk is we're doing more double-precision operations than we used to. I think the additional correctness is worth it but it would be nice to know how much we are paying (if we are paying anything, that is!)
body: @mruberry I think the primary risk is we're doing more double-precision operations than we used to. I think the additional correctness is worth it but it would be nice to know how much we are paying (if we are paying anything, that is!)
